extends Object
    Builder class for an ButtonComponent

      • buttonFonts

        public ButtonComponent.BCBuilder buttonFonts(Font[] fonts)
        set the fonts for the buttons
        Parameters:
        fonts - the fonts of the buttons. This array has to be as long as the buttonElements' array to assign different fonts. If the number of fonts is less than the number of given buttons the remaining buttons will be assigned with the first font of the font array. If null, the buttons will have their default font.
        Returns:
        the current instance

      • buttonColors

        public ButtonComponent.BCBuilder buttonColors(Color[] colors)
        set the colors for the buttons
        Parameters:
        colors - the background color of the buttons. This array has to be as long as the buttonElements' array to assign different colors. If the number of colors is less than the number of given buttons the remaining buttons will be colored with the first color of the color array. If null, the buttons will have their default color.
        Returns:
        the current instance

      • buttonTextColors

        public ButtonComponent.BCBuilder buttonTextColors(Color[] colors)
        Parameters:
        colors - the text color of the buttons. This array has to be as long as the buttonElements' array to assign different colors. If the number of colors is less than the number of given buttons the remaining buttons will be colored with the first color of the color array. If null, the buttons will have their default color.
        Returns:
        the current instance

      • position

        public ButtonComponent.BCBuilder position(ButtonComponent.Position position)
        set the position of the button bar
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the buttons ( ButtonComponent.Position.NORTH, ButtonComponent.Position.EAST, ButtonComponent.Position.WEST, or ButtonComponent.Position.SOUTH (default))
        Returns:
        the current instance

      • orientation

        public ButtonComponent.BCBuilder orientation(ButtonComponent.Orientation orientation)
        set the orientation of the button within the button bar
        Parameters:
        orientation - the orientation of the buttons (ButtonComponent.Orientation.LEFT, ButtonComponent.Orientation.RIGHT, ButtonComponent.Orientation.CENTER (default) )
        Returns:
        the current instance

      • title

        public ButtonComponent.BCBuilder title(String title)
        set the title of the ButtonComponent instance
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the surrounding border
        Returns:
        the current instance

      • buttonElements

        public ButtonComponent.BCBuilder buttonElements(ButtonElement[] buttonElementArray)
        set the ButtonElement array of the ButtonComponent instance
        Parameters:
        buttonElementArray - an array of ButtonElements. This argument is mandatory.
        Returns:
        the current instance

      • propManager

        public ButtonComponent.BCBuilder propManager(IPropertyManager propMgr)
        set a IPropertyManager implementation
        Parameters:
        propMgr - the property manager
        Returns:
        the builder instance for further use
